com.solacesystems.jcsmp

Interface XMLMessageListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectFlowHandleImpl, FlowHandleImpl, JCSMPMessageListener, MessageListenerAdapter

    public interface XMLMessageListener
    XMLMessageListener is used to receive messages asynchronously.

    When providing an implementation of XMLMessageListener to XMLMessageConsumer, the received message is delivered asynchronously to the application through this callback interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onException(JCSMPException exception)
      On error, this method is invoked.
      void onReceive(BytesXMLMessage message)
      The callback method to handle messages received by the XMLMessageConsumer.

    • Method Detail

      • onReceive

        void onReceive(BytesXMLMessage message)
        The callback method to handle messages received by the XMLMessageConsumer.
        Parameters:
        message - The BytesXMLMessage received.

      • onException

        void onException(JCSMPException exception)
        On error, this method is invoked. In general, the error is unrecoverable.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception associated with the error condition.
